ComicInfo.Summary:
The have cooked up a batch of new stories for this fourth issue! Louise is on the case of some very peculiar pineapples; Genederella captivates Prince Leonard Destefanous at the Joyous Jam Jamboree; and Tina presents Tinablanca – a romantic, WWII edition of her Erotic Friend Fiction. Bob's Burgers… it’s the awesome animated sitcom that airs on Fox television alongside such other hits as The Simpsons and Family Guy!
Story TitlesTina's Erotic Friend Fiction Presents: Tinablanca, Part 1Louise's Unsolved Mysteries and Curious Curiosities: Bizarre BazaarGene's Rhymey Rhymes That Could One Day Be Songs Presents: Genederella, Part 2*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Luke Ashworth | 1 | B | Cover B | Frank Forte | 2 | C/LE | Rare "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Frank Forte | 3 | D/RE | ComicXposure Exclusive Variant Cover | ? | 4 | E/RE | New York Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover | ? | 5 |
